# Stage 2 Installation Files

Files and scripts for the Stage 2 build process (Application Layer).

## Contents

*   `custom/`: User-provided custom scripts.
*   `generated/`: Scripts generated by PeiDocker based on configuration.
*   `internals/`: Internal PeiDocker setup scripts.
*   `system/`: System configuration scripts (Pixi, Conda, etc.).
*   `utilities/`: Helper scripts.
